content.question: Which of the following was the main cause of the economic developments reflected in Table 1 ?

choices.label: The successful implementation of the Marshall Plan
The strong tradition of industrial development in Eastern European countries
The beneficial effects of economic integration within the European Economic Community (EEC)
The adoption of the Soviet model of rapid industrialization and economic planning by COMECON countries

content.answer: The adoption of the Soviet model of rapid industrialization and economic planning by COMECON countries

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
